serverError.KER-KMS-002: ApplicationId not found in Key Policy(fra)
serverError.KER-KMS-006: timestamp should be in ISO 8601 format yyyy-MM-ddTHH::mm:ss.SSSZ(fra)
serverError.KER-KMS-008: Service is  not able to store sign certificate(fra)
serverError.KER-KMS-010: Reference Id Not Supported for the Application ID.(fra)
serverError.KER-KMS-011: Root Key not available to sign.(fra)
serverError.KER-KMS-012: Key Generation Process is not completed.(fra)
serverError.KER-KMS-014: Certificate Key Not Matching with stored Key.(fra)
serverError.KER-KMS-015: Upload of certificate will not be allowed to update other domain certificate.(fra)
serverError.KER-KMS-016: Not allowed to generate new key pair for other domains.(fra)
serverError.KER-KMS-017: Certificate Not found in keystore table.(fra)
serverError.KER-KMS-018: Not Allowed to perform decryption with other domain key.(fra)
serverError.KER-KMS-019: Not able to decrypt Symmetric Key using the Private Key.(fra)
serverError.KER-KMS-020: Signing operation for allowed for the provided application id & reference id.(fra)
